Department of Psychiatry - University of Cape Town

version_statement.version_notes: First comprehensive release with harmonized mental health constructs across African sites

title_statement.title: Collaborative Research on African Mental Health

study_info.abstract: CRAM is a collaborative multi-site study examining mental health prevalence, risk factors, and service utilization across sub-Saharan Africa. The study harmonizes mental health measures across eight African countries to enable comparative research.
study_info.geog_coverage: Eight sub-Saharan African countries with urban and rural sites
study_info.data_kind: Cross-sectional survey data with mental health assessments
study_info.universe: Adults aged 18-65 years in selected communities across participating African countries
